name: notes-styles
description: CSS files for my Markdown notes

scripts.build:base: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/base.scss dist/base.css
scripts.build:anli5005: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/anli5005-notes.scss dist/anli5005-notes.css
scripts.build:anli5005:preview: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/anli5005-notes-preview.scss dist/anli5005-notes-preview.css
scripts.build:apa:w: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/apa-w.scss dist/apa-w.css
scripts.build:apa:w:preview: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/apa-w-preview.scss dist/apa-w-preview.css
scripts.build: npm-run-all --parallel build:base build:anli5005 build:anli5005:preview build:apa:w build:apa:w:preview && npm run prefix
